description.narrative: The project will: i) help address the climate change impacts in the Philippines by providing base load renewable energy power; ii) help maintain the avoidance of GHG emissions equivalent to about 5,047,997 tons of CO2 per year; iii) contribute to diversification of Philippine electricity generation mix in the Philippines which is currently skewed towards coal based generation; iv) provide uninterrupted, reliable electricity supply to people of Philippines.

mailing-address.narrative: Energy Development Corporatio Erwin O. Avante Vice President, Corporate Finance +632 9822177 avante.eo@energy.com.ph 38F One Corporate Center, Julia Vargas corner Meralco Ave., Pasig City, Metro Manila, The Philippines www.energy.com.ph
